drawer.wallet.connect.summary: Connect to your Ethereum account to start using Loopring Swap.
drawer.wallet.connect.login: You need to unlock your layer-2 account to start swapping.
drawer.wallet.connect.logout: You have unlocked your layer-2 account. Enjoy our non-custodial & high-performance swapping experience.
drawer.wallet.connect.register: Please activate a Loopring layer-2 account to start swapping.
swap.success: The swap was correctly submitted. It should soon be reflected in your balances.
footer.warning: Source code not audited by Loopring, use at your own risk.
invalid.chain.id.message: You're currently on an invalid network. Please switch to {chainName}
success.register: The registration transaction was correctly broadcast to the network. On confirmation, in a few minutes, you'll be able to use Loopring Swap.
warn.account.not.found: Seems like this account is not yet on our platform. Please register first.
warn.register.existing.account: Seems like you already own a Loopring account.
error.login: There was an error logging in. Please try again later.
error.supported.tokens: There was an error fetching the supported tokens. Please try again later.
error.supported.markets: There was an error fetching the supported markets. Please try again later.
error.user.balances: There was an error fetching your balances. Please try again later.
error.swap.data: There was an error fetching the current market swap data. Please try again later.
error.swap.size: There's currently not enough liquidity to process the swap. Please try again later.
error.swap: An error occurred performing the swap. Please try again later.
error.auth.status: There was an error checking your auth status. Please try again later.
error.register: There was an error registering. Please try again later.
